attributes.action: that child (under 18 years) beauty pageants be banned.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After watching "Baby Beauty Queens" on BBC Three this evening (20th July 2009), I have witnessed the horrific nature of child beauty pageants. These events are bad for our society through entertaining paedophiles and unfulfilled mothers, as well as promoting vanity and causing insecurity in the children involved about their appearance. Girls at six would rather be playing with Barbie Dolls, not be turned into one.
